I cannot read the purpose of God in my affliction, but He knows what is best, and I will commit my soul, body, and spirit to Him as unto my faithful Creator. "For I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that He is able to keep that which I have committed 
                                                                           144
unto Him against that day" (2 Timothy 1:12).  -- Letter 7, 1892.
